plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Aucun volet n\\'est paramétré, cliquer s: No shutter management configured, click on "Add" to start
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Condition à remplir pour que la gestion: Condition to be fulfilled for automatic management to be activated (empty by default = always active)
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Indiquer la fréquence de contrôle des ex: Indicate the frequency of checking exceptions and positioning conditions
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Indiquer la fréquence de vérification vo: Indicate the frequency of verification desired by a cron notation
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Reprendre la gestion automatique après u: Resume automatic management after manual movement of the shutter
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Indiquer le délai en minutes après leque: Indicate the time in minutes after which automatic management can resume
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Cocher la case pour reprendre la gestion: Check the box to resume automatic management in case of a mode change
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Cocher la case pour que les exceptions a: Check the box for the exceptions with immediate action to run regardless of other conditions, even if suspended
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Cocher la case pour utiliser les coordon: Check the box to use the GPS coordinates entered in the general configuration of Jeedom
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Indiquer la latitude du bâtiment ou du v: Indicate the latitude of the building or shutter
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Indiquer la longitude du bâtiment ou du: Indicate the longitude of the building or shutter
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Indiquer l'altitude du bâtiment ou du vo: Indicate the elevation of the building or shutter
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Indiquer le pourcentage minimal de ferme: Indicate the minimum closing percentage (generally 0) and maximum opening percentage (generally 99 or 100)
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Indiquer le temps maximum en secondes po: Indicate the maximum time in seconds to perform a complete opening or closing movement
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Renseigner la commande info\/numérique i: Enter the info / numeric command indicating the current position of the shutter
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Renseigner la commande action\/curseur p: Enter the action / cursor command used to position the shutter
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Renseigner la commande action permettant: Enter the action command to refresh the position of the shutter (optional)
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Renseigner l'action qui sera effectuée p: Enter the action that will be performed by default if no exception or position is valid
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Indiquer la position voulue en pourcenta: Indicate the desired position in percentage
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Cet onglet permet de définir des règles: This tab allows you to define specific rules to be applied as an exception to the conditions relating to the position of the sun
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Les règles d'exception sont vérifiées le: The exception rules are checked one after the other, it is possible to modify their order by dragging and dropping
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.La gestion automatique s'arrête à la pre: The automatic management stops at the first validated rule and places the shutter in the indicated position
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Condition à remplir pour exécuter la règ: Condition to be fulfilled to run the rule (optional)
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.La condition ne sera valide que si le vo: The condition will only be valid if the shutter is in the specified mode, several modes can be entered separated by commas (optional)
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Cocher la case pour que la règle s'exécu: Check the box for the rule to run immediately as soon as the condition is valid
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Cocher la case pour que l'action immédia: Check the box for the immediate action to be executed even if the general condition is not met
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Cocher la case pour suspendre la gestion: Check the box to suspend automatic management as long as the rule is valid
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Indiquer la position voulue en pourcenta: Indicate the desired position in percentage (empty = no action, -1= in the event of immediate action, management will be resumed)
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Label: Label
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Label associé à la validation de la règl: Label associated with the validation of the exception rule (optional)
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Cet onglet permet de définir le cœur mêm: This tab is used to define the very heart of the automatic management motor and thus adjust the position of the shutter according to that of the sun. Additional conditions can be added to refine these criteria
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Les conditions sont vérifiées les unes a: The conditions are checked one after the other, it is possible to modify the order by dragging and dropping
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Si aucune règle ne vient en exception, l: If no rule is an exception, automatic management stops at the first validated condition and places the shutter in the indicated position. If no condition is valid then the automatic management performs the default action
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Bornes d'azimuth du soleil en degrés: Azimuth limits of the sun in degrees
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Label associé à la validation de la cond: Label associated with the validation of the condition (optional)
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Cet onglet recense les programmations du: This tab lists the programming of the Agenda plugin acting on the automatic management of this shutter
plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/php\/sunsh.Exemple : planifier une suspension et un: Example: schedule a manual suspend and resume during a child's nap hours

plugins\/sunshutter\/desktop\/js\/sunshu.Programmations du plugin Agenda liées au: Schedules of the Agenda plugin linked to the shutter

plugins\/sunshutter\/core\/class\/sunshu.Gestion automatique suspendue, vérificat: Automatic management suspended, verification of the delay before resumption
plugins\/sunshutter\/core\/class\/sunshu.Délai de reprise atteint : réactivation: Recovery time reached: reactivation of automatic management
plugins\/sunshutter\/core\/class\/sunshu.Ecart avec la dernière position connue s: Deviation from the last known position greater than 4%: suspension of automatic management
plugins\/sunshutter\/core\/class\/sunshu.Label: Label
plugins\/sunshutter\/core\/class\/sunshu.Condition générale non remplie - Mais ac: General condition not met - But forced action
plugins\/sunshutter\/core\/class\/sunshu.Condition générale non remplie - Aucune: General condition not fulfilled - No action
plugins\/sunshutter\/core\/class\/sunshu.Condition avec action immédiate + suspen: Condition with immediate action + suspension of automatic management
plugins\/sunshutter\/core\/class\/sunshu.Ecart avec la position cible inférieur à: Deviation from target position less than 4%: no action
plugins\/sunshutter\/core\/class\/sunshu.Calcul de positionnement - Action par dé: Positioning calculation - Default action: Custom position
Positioning calculation - Default action: Do nothing
plugins\/sunshutter\/core\/class\/sunshu.Gestion automatique suspendue manuelleme: Automatic management suspended manually: no action
plugins\/sunshutter\/core\/class\/sunshu.Condition avec suspension de la gestion: Condition with suspension of automatic management
plugins\/sunshutter\/core\/class\/sunshu.Condition remplie mais position vide - A: Condition fulfilled but position empty - No action

info.json.Ce plugin va vous permettre de gérer fac: This plugin will allow you to easily manage the automatic positioning of your shutters according to the sun and / or other conditions. IMPORTANT: this plugin only works with equipment having an action / cursor control allowing the shutter to be positioned at a certain opening / closing percentage
